item.title: External Storage on the Pinebook Pro with ZFS
item.description: The Pinebook Pro comes with a small amount of internal disk space, only 64 GB. While this is upgradeable to 128 GB, that still isn’t enough for those with large media collections. The easiest solution is to use a microSD card. And now you’re just dying to use ZFS on that, right? Tutorial Following the previous post, ../install_zfs_pinebook_pro.html, this tutorial describes the steps required to setup a microSD card for your music files with ZFS on the Pinebook Pro.
